title: Deaths per day in West African countries with 2014 Ebola outbreak by disease
summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Diseases, and Number of deaths per day in each Diseases on the y axis.
Diseases HIV/AIDS has the highest Number of deaths per day and Ebola has the lowest Number of deaths per day.
There is a difference of 681.0 between the maximum Diseases HIV/AIDS and minimum Diseases Ebola.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of deaths per day for 6 number of Diseasess.
Diseases HIV/AIDS has the highest Number of deaths per day and Ebola has the lowest Number of deaths per day.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Diseases, and Number of deaths per day in each Diseases on the y axis.
Diseases HIV/AIDS has the highest Number of deaths per day and Ebola has the lowest Number of deaths per day.
There is a difference of 681.0 between the maximum Diseases HIV/AIDS and minimum Diseases Ebola.
max_summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Diseases, and Number of deaths per day in each Diseases on the y axis.
Diseases HIV/AIDS has the highest Number of deaths per day and Ebola has the lowest Number of deaths per day.
Second maximum Number of deaths per day is found at Diseases Malaria.
Diseases Ebola has 171.25 times less Number of deaths per day than Diseases HIV/AIDS which is the highest.
Number of deaths per day at Diseases HIV/AIDS is 685.0 , second place is Malaria at 552.0, and thirdly is Diarrhoea at 404.0.
The Diseases Ebola tends to be 2.32 percent lower than average.
